AttackerCapabilities: Ability to identify vulnerabilities in web applications

Steps.Description: The attacker examines the URL and notices that it points to a local file 'file:///flag'.

StepDetails.Hypothesis: The attacker hypothesizes that the local file 'flag' might contain sensitive information.
StepDetails.Action: The attacker modifies the URL to access the local file 'file:///etc/passwd' instead of 'file:///flag'.
StepDetails.Result: The attacker successfully retrieves the contents of the '/etc/passwd' file.
